pageContext.collection_description: Contains internal records, manuscripts, radio scripts, books and periodicals of the publishing company. Includes scripts for The Avenger, 1941 and n.d., Doc Savage, 1943, Chick Carter-Boy Detective, 1943-1945, Nick Carter, Master Detective, 1943-1955, and The Shadow (including Australian scripts and South American scripts in Portuguese), 1937-1954. See online list at https://library.syr.edu/digital/guides/s/street_smith.htm
